name: NOTHING (itch) (FOXTRAILSTUDIOS)
description:
Experiencing NOTHING is a nice way to spend a few minutes between working too hard, or even working too little!

NOTHING is a relaxing, atmospheric experience where you don't have to do anything other than just enjoy the display. 

Future updates will let you shape the sky how you want, adding or removing clouds, changing the Rayleigh and Mie scattering values, adjusting rain/snow amounts, changing the length of the day and night, adjusting the sun and moon size in the sky, and so much more.

The roadmap can be found here: https://trello.com/b/antWeK6O/nothing
The studio Discord is: https://discord.gg/PCQGt3KDVR

Features: 

  • Realistic atmospheric effects
  • Many weather presets
  • Realtime clouds
  • Dynamic realtime lighting

Requirements:

  • Windows 10/11
  • Graphics card capable of DirectX12
  • <1GB RAM
  • 250MB free Harddrive space
